WorkItem.Description: Can there be a banked gear (or saved gear) feature put in.  This would save one the time and trouble of adding (ie, selected) in banked gear each and every time the program is run.

Comments.Message: Make sure that you are making use of the Save Character Profile, instead of just loading from the Armory every time.
Character Profiler (Check curse or similar) can also be useful for this purpose.

It also sounds like you are not Saving the character before closing Rawr. Saving your character lets you reload it locally from your system without re-downloading it from the Armory and having to redo all of your settings
Saved Character profiles are not always compatible with newer versions of the program.
